main event: An oval-shaped object with a long tail was observed in Kansas City, Missouri on September 25, 1958.
interesting points: The object was the size of a streetlight and had a translucent, hazy color., The tail was narrower than the object and pointed straight up., The observation lasted for 11 minutes., An Air Force B-47 was in the vicinity during the sighting., The conclusion was that it was probably a balloon or aircraft due to insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: oval shaped object with a long tail
